GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
rcutorture: Fix ksoftirqd boosting timing and iteration

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 7e7472c62c6ded322afd9d5ac8bb20a08e7c5674, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit ea6d962e80b61996aeacb443661cc3adcb605315. For more details please see the references link.
